revised_title: A 17th Century Account of the Plague in Dantzick
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the plague outbreak in Dantzick in 1709, describing the efforts made by the city's authorities to prevent the spread of the disease, the symptoms and progression of the plague, and the impact on the population. The author also shares their personal experiences and observations during the outbreak, including the loss of family members to the disease.
